content.detailedDescription: I was at brownwood state park near brownwood texas on the evening of nov. 9, 2009 around 8 :00 pm i observed 10 to 15 very bright lights suddenly  lighting up very high in the sky. the lights stayed lit for several seconds before fading out. the lights were slightly amber in color. they exhibited no signs of being a rocket-mounted or of having been launched or dropped, they were extremely stable. a few lit up at the same time. shortly after seeing the lights two fighter jets circled the area 15 to 20 times then headed east.
content.summary: Various spotlight like lights high in sky for several seconds then fade.

content.detailedDescription: I was out for a smoke and watching the skies as usual and saw what looked like a star... in motion. it was moving fast in a zig zag motion in the sky by the big dipper. i watched it for about 20 seconds and then it was gone. i thought at first that it was a sattilite, but they move in a straight line and this made two 90 deg. turns. i ran inside to tell my husband but it was gone by then.
content.summary: Fast zig-zag star

content.detailedDescription:
Recent one, i once again felt as if my body and soul(being form) was being seperated from each. giving me a feeling of each part of myself going each the opposite direction. believe it is sort of a scan devise that must divide any physical particals.I firmly feel it is part of an under ground base. which is not of our regular military. due to other gained personal information. along with our local military base interception of its appearance; possible seen on its radar. belive this odd unmarked craft shot away to where there was no further agression from that interception of our military. for our military plane( jet) returned to area and flew back towards its base direction. i have also been, witness and or taken; with black silent helicopters. which hovered directly over my vechile. i get these weird and odd feelings when these crafts appear. i have been abducted since childhood. have way more information . if interested. no need to say i am scared, but willing to help. last time i tried to contact you---computer died.
also have information about seeing alien being with 2 exact twin young male humans in its possion,that it had total mind control over them. this took place at a near-by restaurant.Incident took place about three years ago.
content.summary: Small ufo (12ft wide, 4ft high)flew slowly past mobile home at tree top height.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were getting out of his truck on the street and walking across the yard to my house looking at the sky. it was a cool, clear night. we both immediately noticed what we thought to be either an unusually large bright star or a planet. we also saw other stars that appeared normal at the time and looked to be in a big dipper configeration. we focused our attention on the largest object, though, because it was so beautiful. after a couple of minutes we both noticed that it began to hover slightly and then saw a red light at the top that came on and was flashing. then a green light at the bottom would flash. then a bright white white light at the top would flash. i went inside to get binoculors. over time, these lights would take turns flashing as in a pattern. sometimes it returned to all white but would become larger and change shapes. sometimes it would look like a triangle, sometimes like a long vertical rectangle, sometimes it even appeared to be a celestial being with a bright white head and open arms. my friend thought that it looked like a large quartz crystalline structure. at times a large dark red area would appear that looked like a door opening and closing. everytime it rotated positions it changed the appearance of the overall craft. i then began to focus on the other brighter stars i could see with the binoculors. i was amazed to see that they were now not stars like i had first thought. they had the same basic configerations and colors as the largest craft, just smaller in size. there were four others like this and they were located in a triangle relative to the largest craft. it appeared that they were surrounding the city. they stayed stationary for the entire time i was watching them. after the first hour of watching, i noticed what i thought was a helicopter moving through the sky but it was too high up and made no sound. under the binoculors i could see that it was just like the other crafts but all red. it moved across the sky and out of vision. later, two small red crafts appeared and hovered next to each other about midway between the mothership and another stationary craft i previously mentioned. same flashing lights and patterns, but all red. they moved on after about 30 minutes. not long after that i saw what i thought was a plane due to a line of red lights in a vertical pattern (again, no sound), as on a wing span. but as it moved across the sky, it rotated and the lights looked like a "greater than" mathematical symbol. it rotated again and i could see that it was actually a disc-shaped flying saucer type craft. it moved rapidly around the sky then out of vision.
actual airplanes and helicopters were flying in the sky over this 2 hr. period, so i am very sure that the other objects i described were not normal aircraft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed 4 crafts that remained stationary and several others that moved across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my back porch to investigate the sound of animals fighting, like a cat or dog. i had been in my family room watching letterman when i heard the noises. i looked around unsuccessfully for a few seconds, when something caught my eye flying overhead. for a fleeting second, i thought i may be seeing some geese, and that would possibly explain the sound i was hearing, but within a second, i realized that what i was seeing were four separate aircraft of some kind. they were completely luminescent boomerang or flying wing vehicles, with no body, only wings. it looked for a second like they were very close to the ground, because of the way they were lit up, like they were catching reflected light from the street lights. i soon realized that they were much further up than that, maybe two or three hundred feet. what shook me was how fast they were going. i watched them go from one horizon, (at first sight) from the east, and disappear out of sight on the southwest horizon, in about six seconds. 
i would compare it to the time over this past summer when the space shuttle flew over our area. my wife and i waited up for it, after we saw it on the news. these vehicles that i saw last night, were going about that fast. they were completely, and absolutely silent. 
     three of them were in a tight formation, and the fourth one was flying slightly behind and to the left of the 3 in formation. 

i am a 58 year old police officer. i just retired early this year, after 30 years of service. i have seen just about everything that you could imagine, but i have never seen anything like those aircraft. they defied conventional wisdom, and are contrary to everything i thought i knew about aircraft. it takes a lot to shake me, but what i saw did just that. i didn't sleep a wink. i was completely sober, and wide awake during this sighting. i have never seen, or reported anything like this before. i will not report it locally, because i want to protect my reputation.

thanks for your website.
content.summary: 4 separate aircraft, all boomerang, or flying wing shape. luminous, glowing, over 100% of their surface. no typical aircraft lights of any kind.

content.detailedDescription: Driving toward longmont, co, from boulder, co on hwy 119 shortly after 6pm, saw a bright starlike object in the sky.  at first i thought it was a star, but it seemed too close to be a star.  while i was watching, 2 more star-like objects seemed to come from the first, to form a triangular formation.  then 2 more formed directly under these 2.  these 5 bright "stars" held formation for what seemed to be about 5 minutes, and then all disappeared simultaneously, like someone had turned off a light switch.
content.summary: Appearance of bright starlike objects in formation, sudden disappearance

content.detailedDescription:
my family & i had a sighting of two disc shaped objects on saturday 15th august.
the time was between 8.30-9.00pm. 
 it was dusk, well just turning dark.
we had parked on the field just by the rowing club by the river in caversham 
(between what used to be called the holiday inn, not sure what it's called now, & rivermead lesuire center)
 - just off richfield avenue.
 we were getting out of our car, & were on our way to the fair, when our two boy's started shouting "look there's a ufo" "look!  what is that?.
we looked up expected to see a plane, instead we saw a huge round orange light. 
 within a few seconds the light went out & we could all see a dark grey disc, rotating as it moved.
 it was flying just below the clouds coming from the direction of london/heathrow se.
 travelling on a straight path, heading in the direction of nettlebed(north).
it travelled at the speed of a plane maybe slower.  the rotation of the disc seemed to be distorting the air, around it.
we watched it until it  was almost out of sight, then our eldest son noticed  another disc the same as the disc we had just observed, it followed on the same path as the first disc we watched for 3-4 minutes altogether.
by that point are eye's were straining to focus as it was turning really dark.

we were shocked to see these huge dark grey disc's overhead where we would usually see passenger jet's.

files 2 & 3 are not connected to this sighting
content.summary: Large orange light  went out we could see large drey disc.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 or 10:30 my friend called me hysterically claiming that he was watching ufo's in the sky and told me to hurry over to his dorm. i heard there was a meteor shower coming soon and thought he was just watching that. i get to the dorm and he rushes me to the window and as i look out i see nothing. as i am about to tell him such 2 red lights fly around each other and zoom off in opposite directions and a 3rd very bright white light appears out of nowhere. we continue to watch in awe cursing at what we are seeing. next 2 bright lights appear and begin to move and a little later one becomes 2 small red lights and the other disappears. the red lights stay in the sky for a good 30 seconds and then disappear, in the mean time they are flying back-n-forth across the sky. the foothills and flatirons are in clear view from our windows and this morning we saw that the objects were too close to the mountains to be any type of aircraft (ie helicopters and planes). also if they were some type of manmade aircraft, 2 red lights appear and get dimmer as if moving away and then an instant later one is gone the one more right suddenly is a bright light. had this been an aircraft it would have had to do a complete 180 turn in a split second. 2 lights with red and white appear a fair length apart and then appear to rotate and we saw what looked like a cigar shape with red lights on the ends. the object couldn't have been smaller than 30 yards long. we rush outside and try to get a good view. over the course before this we see what i described many times only with more appearances by the large bright light. the activity continues as we are outside but not as dramatically. for about 10 minutes there is no activity but then the large bright light comes on and stays on for a second, goes away for another second, then comes back for a second, then off, and repeats 2 more times. we see various red lights over the 20 minutes after the bright light stops and then my friend screams "abduct me!" and all activity stops for about 15 minutes as we walk back up to his room.  then the lights come back and begin to fly back-n-forth yet again with very high strobe activity from small white lights to red every 5 blinks or so, only this time there appears to be a short beam of light coming from underneath, not like those abduction beams but lights. 3 of these appear and form a triangle shape and move around and the shape gets distorted like its moving in crazy directions. all activity stops for 3 minutes and then 2 of the red lights with beams appear a good 100 yards or more away from each other and fly at a large speed and collide and appear to become 1 and then disappear in almost an instant. at the exact moment, another large bright white light juts out of the darkness maybe 150 yards away from the collision point and disappears 4 seconds later. all activity ceases for 10-15 minutes and i head back to my room on the same floor. 10 minutes after sitting down i get another call that they are flying around like crazy and blinking like crazy and i run over to his room to see one of the objects with the beams fly to the left and disappear. many people came into the room over the entire period of this and saw activity but threw it away as airplanes. a red light appears some minutes later and flies to the left and disappears and then reappears far on the right and continues heading left and then disappears again. i wait 15 more minutes and then again go back to my room, this is about 12 or 12:30 now. i told my friend to call me if anything dramatic happens again and i fall asleep at 4:30am with no call. in the morning i ask him if he saw anything else and he says he stayed up til about 2:30 watching various lights appear and reappear. after seeing the red lights moving i thought it was just a plane but then the agile movements began. tears were in my eyes, i could not believe what i was seeing, i felt so very confused. attached is a view from his window i took today. the objects stayed above the bottom of the mountains and below halfway into the sky. also this morning a farmer in las animas county found one of his cattle mutilated, no blood, no tracks, no reproductive organs. please provide some answers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Bright lights (white and red) fly just over the mountain edge.

content.detailedDescription:
Nov. 10, 2009 7:00 pm: getting into my car to go to dinner w/ friends. my son was in the seat behind me and my husband was locking our door and getting into passenger seat. he had his back to the event when it happened. my son did not see it because he was behind me. it happened very fast.
my car was parked facing north/northwest direction in the south hills of eugene, oregon( lane county) in our driveway. over the top of my house and between two large fir trees it came from the right side moving fast towards the left. travelling north or northwest. a huge ballish light that was blue green and somewhat sphere/disc shaped. behind it was a orangish colored small tail. it was travelling very fast and was huge. i have never seen anything like it. i called the local news station immediately to report a meteor possibly? their meterologist said there was nothing in the sky. i you tubed videos today to see if it was a meteor. all the images in the you tube videos of meteors disinigrate as it hits the atmosphere. this did not happen with the object i saw. 
we watched an airplane fly around the sky right afterwards and it was tiny in comparison to what i saw. the airplane seemed to change directions from heading west to following the direction of the object. rather curious.
the light ball travelled quickly in the clear sky from my viewpoint maybe 4 or 5 seconds due to trees blocking the view.
it was one of the most amazing things i have ever seen. it was gigantic. it also seemed low in the sky. no sounds were heard.
content.summary: Disc(ish) shape ball of light that was green/blue very large fast moving with a small tail of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dog this morning between the hours of 10am and 12pm. around 11:25, i looked up in the sky and there were two star-like objects moving in sporadic patterns around each other. there were no clouds at all, just bright and blue.

i took off my polarized sunglasses and they were almost impossible to see, so i put them back on.

the quasi-circular patterns that they were moving in looked as though they moved from north to south. upon reaching the southern most point, they illuminated like a very bright star in the middle of the day. that only lasted a few seconds, then faded back to its regular luminance. we can assume they were reflecting sunlight.

at one point, one of the two went very far away off in a west/south west direction. then came back together after about 30 or 40 seconds.

the whole event lasted (for me) about 3 or 4 minutes. during the final moments, they both headed exactly due north together.

i can only imagine how high up in the atmosphere these objects were. they appeared to be moving rather slowly. however, given the distance, there was probably nothing slow about the rate at which they were traveling.
content.summary: Two star-like objects moving slowly around each other

content.detailedDescription: I was cleaning the flowers beds at home when i noticed a light in the sky. it appeared as if somebody turned on a light. it was about as bright as the planet was in the evening sky that night. no clouds. the moon was visible low in the eastern sky behind me that night. it occurred at 6:31 pm and only lasted a few seconds. it appeared and remained still for approx 3 seconds, then it proceeded to head in a north west direction at which time it pulsed two times rather brightly and then the light diminished to a very light red glow before it went away. there were no sounds and it was not an aircraft. there were numerous planes in the area that night and it did not look like any lights i have ever seen on any type of aircraft. all the aircraft in the area were following the same basic flight path of an east to west direct. this went north west when it did start to move. i doubt it was a meteor or something because when it first appeared it was not moving. the movement did not occur until a few seconds after it appeared. the entire object was only visible for approx 8-10 seconds. i waited and searched the night sky for about 20 minutes to see if it reappeared or any signs of lights in that direction and nothing. it appeared almost directly overhead of my location and slightly west. if i had to guess an altitude based on the aircraft in the area i would guess around 20-25,000 feet.
content.summary: Strange lights in the evening sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and noticed in the eastern sky what looked like two stars in the sky the only ones.   one of them one went up into sky straight up like an elevator and it seemed at medium speed and then it disappeared.  it wasn't as bright as the star.
content.summary: Light that lifted into the sky like it was on an elevator.

content.detailedDescription:
(all times and dates are approximate)

it was around eleven o'clock at night. my girlfriend was first to see the phenomena, out her upstairs window looking to the west. she said it originally asppeared as 4 small white objects in a diamond pattern, with what seemed a star in the middle. two of the objects moved to the right, slightly moving away from each other. i at this point observed the two objects, and their exhibited slight movement. they stayed still for roughly ten seconds. then the lower-placed object darted suddenly to the right, very quickly, and left our view. the higher object shot upward and to the left, quickly disappearing from view. 

it's not much, but i figured i'd send it in. there were no flashing lights, such as an airplane might exhibited, and they went from being still to suddenly moving away in opposite directions with a speed that is contrary to what an airplane might perform.

at the time i was listening to a radio program. i don't know why my girlfriend looked out the window, it was more or less spontaneous. for whatever reason it held her attention. i'm very interested in the ufo phenomenon and read up on the subject heavily. it was mildly excited by the sighting, as i, like most interested parties, have often longed for a personal observation.
content.summary: 4 white objects

content.detailedDescription:
i was on stanley & murray st by the new casino along with other witnesses in the area watching it.
the object was there from when i arrived around 6:15, watched for 30 minutes, rushed home to get camera, came back it was only there for 30 second more so i captured nothing on video. 

there were many witnesses looking up and staring and commenting, some screaming saying " omg what is that" etc. i noticed at least 5 witnesses and talked briefly to a few people about it.

it was almost straight up in the sky as after the clouds went away a bit i noticed it was in the area of w cassopia. 

it flashed when the casino spot lights hit it, just like the previous youtube video's from the end of october of this year, but those video's had only 1 small light, this had 2 identical lights and a longer one in between them.

i could not make out anything when the spotlights were not hitting it as there was cloud cover and it was already night.

it looked like it was just above the clouds, quite high, 1000 feet for sure, about 2 inches long﻿ at arms length. very bright, was in a straight line time facing nnw.

the light was white with a tinge of blue, light itself was the straight like a bar bell with 2 lights on the end.
it had a smaller light on each end of the bar that were identical in shape. there was a light, then a small space then light. this composed the small light at each end.
then there was the middle bar light which was about 5x the length of the small end lights.

 had a middle longer bar then the light like the video again in a straight line.
since it was there for about 30 minutes or more as i was watching it, i was hoping it might be there for a while longer, so i rushed home to get a camera and my night vision monocular.
when i got back, it was there for only about30 seconds more, i couldn't even set up the camera to take any video then it disappeared.

i waited until after 9:20pm to see if it would come back but i didn't see it anymore.

just before 9pm, still looking in the area of the sky where it was using my night vision monocular, i suddenly saw a dot just like a small star moving in a straight line and immediately thought it was a satellite as i have spent countless nights star gazing and see satellites every 5 minutes sometimes which is nothing unusual. 

this light however  stopped going straight, slowed down smoothly, but quickly, and turned, started flying around that area with incredible speed and maneuverability, it's very difficult to describe the type of movement...It was fast, reactive, but still smooth flying, not like a bug or bird or anything i've ever seen....Keep in mind i've star gazed for decades, have owned numerous telescopes, so i'm familiar with what i can see out there, this was like nothing i've ever seen.

this point light looked to be very high as it was in focus with the stars, anything very close would be out of focus on my night vision as it's manual adjusted focus so it had to be quite distant.

this light then darted off in a straight line after the maneuvers, and the lights from the street and buildings flared up the night vision and i couldn't view it anymore as there were street lights everywhere.

the whole time i was yelling out "that's impossible" etc, i couldn't contain myself.
content.summary: Bar shaped ufo hovering with detail and point light with amazing manuverability

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was going out to use my telescope at 3am. 
2. it was clearly visible from my vantage point
3. i was not sure if it was a plane banking to the right at first. but them the lights became so erratic/mesmerizing, i was convinced it was unidentified.
4. you could not see the outline of the actual craft. just the mesmerizing array of lights moving about. they seemed to increase in intensity. there was not sound and considering it was only about 300-400 yards away, if it was a plane, i would think you would have heard it.
5. my feeling was i had definitely seen a ufo and was quite excited. i do see many planes coming in to the mansfield airport. but at that close distance, i can usually hear something. the commercial flights to logan are typically much much higher up.
6. the object went around the corner behind the trees, it did not accelerate away. it looked almost like it was surveying.
content.summary: Orb-like object with glancing red and white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Around 6:15-6:45ish cst on the evening of nov. 3rd, i was driving southbound on the parkway. in the distance, to the left (east) as i was going by the parkway city mall area and overpass, there was a stationary flashing white light that was followed by a bright red light that faded out much slower;  it continued in that pattern (white flash, red fade, white flash, red fade). i understand that there's many towers on the mountains/monte santo mtn in the distance but this was much closer and much lower and appeared to be around the drake ave/whitesburg intersection area and in the air around 500ft (?). it was well above the trees but still below the top of the mountain range in the distance. the light/object was stationary, as well. i continued south and took the airport rd. exit, headed east on it and the light was still stationary in the distance from what i could tell. it was definitely apparent that it was not near or on the mountain range at this time as the mountain range was several, several miles still east of the light from this vantage point.  airport rd. eventually turns south and crosses a mountain; i lost sight of it then due to direction and visibility. i witnessed the light for only a few minutes due to driving but it could of have been lingering there for much, much longer.

after a few more nights of driving in that direction after dark, there is no sign of any new towers in that area and i have not seen any other lights in that airspace again since. i've been a resident of this immediate area for over a decade and cannot remember any other incidents or lights similar to this in our area.
content.summary: A white flashing light follwed by a red light that fades out slower and repeats;  approx.  500  feet above drake/whitesburg intersection area.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:00 am i was walking my dog with my gf when we noticed a small airplane moving slowly from east to west. when it got over our house moving west, we suddenly caught a large grey object moving n to s just missing the small plane we were watching. at first we thought that's a bird because sometimes you can see birds in the dark if they are low enough to the ground and have a large wingspan. within a fraction of a second we realized this was no bird but rather a large boomerang shaped flying wedge gliding smoothly and silently across the dark pre-sunrise sky.It was dimly lit with 3 or 4 lights on the bottom of the craft on each of the leading edges. they were symmetrical i.E. 7 or 8 lights. we had been out for about 15 minutes so our eyes were night adjusted. this craft was dark grey,but slightly lighter than the sky. still, we wouldn't have seen it if we hadn't been looking up at the exact moment it passed over the flight path of the small plane we had been watching. i'm an ex-usaf weather observer and i'm very well trained in cloud heights. i'm estimating the altitude at 8,000 ft and the size as twice that of a 747 and completely silent. this object was menacing as it clearly was operating stealthily over a major metropolitan area (albuquerque) in busy early tuesday skies. their were several other planes in the sky at the time so it was operating in traffic yet i doubt that the small aircraft operator even saw it. neither of us had ever seen a ufo but we have now. there's a chance that we saw a top secret craft and an equal chance we saw an extraterrestrial craft. i'm leaning towards extraterrestrial because of the operating conditions at the time. it's doubtful that usaf would operate stealthily in traffic over abq not to mention the size and silence of the ship.It also traversed the sky from north to south in less than 10 seconds and we lost it quickly due to its color and dim lighting.
content.summary: Walking my dog i saw a large boomerang shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: At abut 11:15 my mom called me from her house about 8 miles north east of me in sahuarita, az telling me about something that had suddenly appeared in the sky.  i went out side to look and to my south east about 4 inches in the sky below the orion constellation's "belt" i saw a very bright flashing light, initially it appeared to sparkle but once i got my camera out and zoomed in as far as i could, i was able to see that it had a shape to it, it appeared to be somewhat round but the lights were along a single line and i had the faint impression of a boomerang.  i tried to take video but the camera i have doesn't zoom in nearly far enough to see anything other than a sparkling light in the sky.  i took a few pictures and a video and watched it for about 45 minutes and it did not appear to move, nor did it move with the sky.  i used orion's belt and a light pole directly below the flashing light, as a reference as to it's possible movement, but it stayed exactly where it was for nearly 45 minutes, then it made a sudden move about 6 inches to the left and was stationary, then once again it moved very quickly in an upward directionabout 3-4 inches then again stayed stationary, and as of right now it has not moved (12:47am)  again.  i initally thought it was a plane, but it didn't move.  then i thought it could be a satellite, but again it wasnt moving, then i thought it was just some kind of air craft from the base, but again the long term lack of movement and then the sudden movement from one place to another and the appearance of the shape, and the colors of the lights, a bright red, blue and green.   i called the kitt peak observatory and they could not give me an answer as to what it could be, i told them where it was in the sky and they said that that was "blank space" no stars, no satellites not the iss, nothing they could suggest that it could be.  the entire time i was viewing the lights i was simply curious, it did not fit into the regular stars in the sky and i simply wanted to know what in the world it could be.   i did take some photos, but they are not the best, i use a kodak easy share camera with 3x zoom so it's not meant for taking such long distance and detailed images.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright flashing lights red blue and green in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Saw a silent triangular craft float toward fermilab .It had a red light on each corner
content.summary: Three triangle shaped red lights flew slowly over fermilab collider lab.

content.detailedDescription:
Moved so fast, too fast to be a bird or even a plane.  moved too quickly for this world as i was looking up towards the east at orion while i had just stepped out for bedtime cigarette.

in the late '90's i saw an accumulation of ufos nearby but they were going east to west, with multitudes of yellow orbs hovering motionless and silent while the big ship which was boomerang shaped and with red lighting (not lights individually as in planes) raced overhead. i witnessed this with others in the area, but none of us reported.  didn't know about you!

in other words, i've seen first hand accounts of ufo's.

so tonight what i saw i can definitely say was not of this world.  no way.  no animal or bird could have done what i saw.  no cloud.  

this being was enormously fast.  if i had to guess, i'd say it was about 200 feet up.  i used to fly in my youth so i do have some keen estimation faculties.  it was cloudy or cloaked but was definitely there!  and of course, unrealistically fast. no bird could have flown the distance i witnessed in the 8 seconds i witnessed the event over orion. it could have been supernatural if not a ufo, but it was surely not of the world we know here on earth.  sorry, no time for photo. it was truly remarkable!!!
content.summary: Cloudy object

content.detailedDescription:
Every tuesday i travel to cornelius to play cards. on february 10, 2009, i had an incredible sighting at a range closer than anything i can find in many ufo chronicles across the web. 
at about 6:15-6:20 on february 10, 2009, i saw a large circular object floating above highway 16 on the west side of charlotte, nc. i was driving toward huntersville when i saw the grayish object floating right above the trees. it was kind of shaped like a flat disk or acorn, and was floating above the trees on the right of the highway. 
the object appeared to be between 50 to 100 feet in diameter and no more than 10 or 20 feet tall. i first noticed the object about 200 yards ahead of me, and i could not see the entire circumference, yet it was a circular object suspended in mid-air. as it was i became immensely curious as to what was keeping it suspended. 
when i approached the object i realized that it was hovering without suspension partially over the highway and the trees on the right side of the road. from a distance it seemed to be shrouded in shadows at the very end of dusk when the sun is on the horizon. 
as i approached i could see in clear detail four lights all on opposite sides in a sort of perfect x-formation on the bottom of the object along with hollow hole in the center of the bottom of the saucer. the skin of the object seemed to be made of a grayish metal with clear, straight seams in a seemingly symmetrical pattern. 
across the bottom of the object there seemed to be markings that looked almost hieroglyphic in nature. in the center of the object there was an empty black hole like there was a middle cylinder removed from the structure. the method of flight of the object seemed to be something completely out of this world, yet since i was on the ground and could not clearly see the top of the object, i could not tell if it had any sort of propeller keeping it adrift in mid-air, yet from every angle that i had a visual i did not see anything that would explain its method of flight. 
the skin almost reminded me of a smooth pewter with a pattern that was grid-like with the hieroglyphic symbols in each cell. from the distance i was it seemed to be texture on the outer surface but i could faintly make out markings in the pattern, but i had no idea what they meant. 
this simple fact - that the object was simply floating a few feet above the trees on the right of the road interested me most, when i realized that the object was beyond the human capacity of technological development, i remember feeling a sudden fear that i should not be witnessing what i was seeing. 
when i passed under the object for a brief moment, i remember passing almost directly under one of the light fixtures which i remember seeing with clear detail. it seemed to emit an intense cone of light similar to those that illuminate night construction on highways, if not brighter. 
the light seemed to be held onto the object on two sides by small v-like metal structures, and the light itself could not have been larger than one of our manufactured 100 watt generic bulbs, yet it burned with great intensity. 
the center hole of the object was most peculiar because it seemed to ascend into the object into a total blackness which my eyes couldn���t penetrate. the hole, from what i could tell, probably took up about 10-20% of the base surface area and was in the exact center of the object. 
when i passed under the object i remember nothing but fear and curiosity in the object. i must have been going close to 100 mph when i was passing under it to get out of its way, and the only thought of stopping for a picture was thwarted with my fears of abduction. 
i still to this day pass by the very curve on highway 16, and remember the sighting every time i drive that route.
content.summary: Passed under a clearly not man-made object in the air back in february

content.detailedDescription:
I originally posted this in the space.Com forums under the unexplained
 i came to the conclusion that there was a very good chance i would never see one. my conclusion was wrong.

last night ( friday september 18th) i saw something that i had never seen before. i live in the canadian rockies in the province of alberta. my house is situated on the end of town, less then a kilometre west is complete wilderness. my room faces south looking onto the backyard, behind the backyard lies a green space. the green space which is several kilometres long and 400 metres wide borders more houses on the other side. there is not a lot of light pollution where i live so stars and planets are easily distinguishable. at around 11:30 pm i was lying in bed and i felt a little bit uncomfortable so i decided to change the position of my pillow. my bed faces north and is pressed against the southern wall so if i turn my head south i can see out my window and see the sky clearly.As i was doing this i was sitting upright, i moved my pillow and began to lay back when something out of the corner of my eye caught my attention. i quickly turned my head south and saw a bright star, all seemed normal and i continued to look at the sky. all of a sudden a bright light appeared west and quite close to this star, it continued to move west rather slowly. i continued to watch this object for another 10 seconds before it stopped and disappeared. it reappeared at a much lower altitude and slightly further to the west and after 10 more seconds it disappeared. once again reappearing but at a much higher altitude and further west. this pattern continued for 30 more seconds until i could not see it anymore through the thicket of trees off in the distance. 

i have no idea what i saw last night. i am certain it wasn't my mind playing tricks on me. the ufo could not have been a plane or satellite because these could not possibly behave the same way. there is a possibility that it was a weather phenomenon unknown to me. the weather conditions were clear skies with low humidity and around 14 degrees celsius.
content.summary: Ufo in the canadian rockies

content.detailedDescription: i was fishing on the black river near the 1st waterfall up from lake superior,u.P. mich., around 200 yards from falls, very loud water sounds, it was 11 or 12 pm, i looked up at all the stars i could see, it is a cut gorge river, so there is only so much sky to see,looking around the stars, i fixed on three stars in an elonggatted triangle,perfect in shape,looked like any other stars, but as soon as i fixed my eyes on them they started to move together in a west northwest direction towards tree line, i freeked and started screaming,hey, hey, goddamit, no that does not do that, pointing to them, and by now thinking that that or they, was an it, a ufo. i was tring to get my friends attention, to no avail.The next thought in my head, as the ufo was going out of my site in the tree line, was that the ufo was watching me until i saw it. it all took of 1 second to start moving once i saw it. total time as it slowly move to the tree line and out of my site was 15 seconds at most. and my dumbass friends did'nt belive me, that pissed me off. this was my second siting in my life.
content.summary: Looked up at the stars, saw 3 in a elonggatted triangle, at that they started moving together in same direction

content.detailedDescription: Driving to longmont from boulder on the diagonal hwy. just after 6 p.M. tonight, i noticed to the west of longmont a half-dozen or so extremely bright, flat objects stacked in a tight formation, one just above and the side of the next. the proximity of these objects to each other was alarming to see. none of them appeared to be moving; several were tilted at 20-30 degrees from the rest. they were just hanging there in a tight group, one above the other. about two minutes after i first noticed them, the lights all disappeared in the very same instant. they simply went out all at once, as if someone had thrown a switch. i've never seen anything like that. didn't see faa or other blinking lights on any of them, nor did any appear to ever turn, bank, dim, or move away - they remained in the same arrangement and distances from one another for the length of my sighting. very strange, and more than a little alarming in that moment to see that kind of air traffic in such close formation in darkness. i'm sure many other must have witnessed this event, as it was during rush hour on a busy stretch of state highway.
content.summary: Six to eight bright, flat objects hovering and disappearing at once.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the grocery store with my son after 7:00. we had turned into our subdivision and topped a hill when i noticed a red stationary object in the sky. i thought it was a reflection on the windshield at first but then it blinked off. i pulled the car over and looked up and i saw it blink on again not far from where i had first seen it. it was stationary once again and lasted for about 30 seconds then blinked out. i rushed home, pulled into the driveway, jumped out of the car and waited for a few minutes and then i saw it again quite a bit farther. this was the last time i saw it blink on, hover and blink off and it was gone. it was very exciting for me and my son. so glad to see that i was not the only one in my area who saw it!!
content.summary: Red light hovering

content.detailedDescription:
There were seven hot air ballons in the sky above my house
my aim was to take a photograph of them all in one shot.

i noticed a small group of white clouds that seemed to be following
the balloons.
they were out of place as the sky was clear blue & they were the only clouds in the sky.
i then saw the sun hit an object in the sky, the sun reflected off the object, created a dazzeling star affect.
my sister also saw this.  as this happened & we both said wow! what was that.
we lodgically said maybe the sun had shone on a plane as it had banked
while changing it's course.

i watched the balloon's untill they all decended one by one in the same area.
i thought i saw several shiney objects during this time but could not 
be sure as they were brief glimpses.

as i watched the last balloon decend i then saw the massive dark disc
very clearly move across the horizion from right to left. i then lost
sight of the object.
the objects seemed to be following/observing the hot air balloon's.
these objects can be seen in most of the photograph's i had taken that day
of the hot air balloon's.
i was at home -  at one point i spoke to my sister on the phone -  she was 
travelling in a car on the m25 towards london, i asked her if she could
see the balloon's she could see the same ballon that i was observing as we spoke, she described the balloon to me it was the only multi-coloured balloon in the sky as the others were red.
we both saw the object reflecting the sun creating a massive bright
star in the sky.
content.summary: Seen while taking photo's of hot air balloons

content.detailedDescription: Arrived home from work, around 6:00 p.M.  got out of my car and looked up over across the street.  five disc-shaped objects up maybe several hundred feet hovering in the sky.  one shot a firework-like display towards the ground.  as i can see more precisely with my glasses on (although certainly well enough to see what i did without them!), i turned around to grab them out of my car (took maybe 4 seconds).  when i looked back up, they were all gone.  i was stunned, wondering what they were. my thoughts were along the line of "what the ??!!@@@ were those?!"; although, i was also thinking that they looked exactly like 5 ufo's hovering. decided to go for a walk down the street.  saw what looked like one more again towards the west (towards the mountains...I live on the front range with the mountains to the west)...It was a disc-looking shape, all bright (it is totallly dark here by 6:00 now, since the time change), moving very slowly, and then disappeared.  i couldn't really tell if it just disappeared or went behind a house.  continued walking for about 10 minutes, and then went back home and took a drive towards the west where there aren't many houses/obstacles for night-sky viewing; but, didn't see anything else.  very intiguing, mysterious incident.  i wish there had been a neighbor outside.
content.summary: Five very bright disc-shaped objects maybe several hundred feet up. one shot  bright firework-like lights down.

content.detailedDescription: Watching west, iknow the  flight paths that come over this area. two to three different objects. came ese over lake then went wnw. changing flashing  strobes.Blue bright in color. then other lights to the south, and one went to the north over the lake. looked like planes chasing one object. still seeing them at this time.
content.summary: Lights over lake mi., then over berrien co.

content.detailedDescription:
I caught something out my window on sunday night when hurricane ida was passing by, it was very windy with high wind gusts..   i saw a light go by my window and i got up to see what it was, i saw this craft stationary behind a tree in my yard, and i saw a small plane fly under it and it never moved.  i ran to get my night vision set up, tv on and camcorder to record it.. it was behind the tree but if you keep watching the wind will start to blow the tree up and you can see it clearly, also its very slowly moving away and down and near end of first vid its under the branch and you can see it better, but its farther and not as clear.. i did 4 videos of this. it was two lights, like headlights of a plane, yet it was moving away, i should not see lights if it was moving away as the lights would be in front of it.

the next say i emailed the chief at sheriff's office and asked if any police helicopters were out at this time. he responded telling me they did not fly all day sunday and to call the faa. i did that next, i talked to two guys at same time and they told me nothing was in my area and certainty nothing stationary in this wind.  they then asked for my web address to see the object. i did not leave my email or phone number.

anyway. here are the four videos i took... first one i ended to try to move my cam higher to see if i can see it better, it moved away from tree and i did, at the end of second one.. i dropped my cam :( 3rd.. it moved behind house and i raised my cam higher on 4th vid.. again it went behind the house and that was end of it...
let me know what you think. .

gwen   http://www.Youtube.Com/user/chantmiss  *my site*

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=-iamtytouze       1
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=8g-bucxo-gg       2
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=vfebqhekjrg       3
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=eorq-tvfw4s&nr=1  4
content.summary: Passed by my window and stopped high behind a tree, did 4 recordings with night vision

content.detailedDescription:
Hi iam chester golat and on the morning of june 21 1978 me and 3 other people that i ride with to work as we car pool from conrath wis usa and from shedon wis usa to work in hawkins wis usa about 30 miles east from conrath on hiway 8.
barb was driving that day and we all just got off from work and we clock out at about 7.01 and was all in barbs car by 7.05 me chet and 2 other guys and barb was the driver that week. we went down hiway 8 west heading home at about 7.13 am we seen something up in the sky to our left or south of us as it soom across the sky and then just stop and then another one came sooming across the sky from our our left and then stop about 50 feet from the 1st one. then the 1st one moved down and the 2nd one moved over where the 1st one was as a 3rd one came in to where the 2nd one was. now a 4th one came in and all 4 were now i a like a square box and a 5th one just came above them and just sat there as the other 4 ufo began to go in circles and follow each other arounr in the square as the 5th ufo just sat up above them.
we pulled the car over to the side of the road and stop and i chet and one other guy got out of the car and sat on the hood of the car and just watch them as other cars went on by us and some other cars did stop to.
then just as thay came thay left one of them in the square circles just left out of the circles to the top left of it as you could see it move out of the circles to the top left in a line left and up and out of the circles and then was just going and a fast as that one left so did the next one and so did the next one and so did the next one all inthe same way and then the 5th one just shot of in the same way. wow we could not belive it what just saw for about 27 minutes. we got back in the car and talk about it some and me chet and the other guy got chewed out some for geting out of the car to watch it. but it was ok with us as we got to watch a great show. barb did tell us about another time when she had seen a ufo and so did chet back in 1974 in conrath. as we were all heading home.   i chet was in the natl. grd for 4 years now and i raced rupp snowmobiles and tractor pulled a allis-chalmers d-17 and a wd-45 and raced a chevrolet stock car and work at golat impl in conrath wis witch was a allis-chalmers & new-idea & wollin silo delear and work out at norco windows in hawkins.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Coming home from work at 7.15 am.
